mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_permission_relation rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND p.id IS NOT NULL AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT p.id FROM ums_admin_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN ums_permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = - 1 AND pr.admin_id = #{adminId} ) UNION SELECT p.* FROM ums_admin_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN ums_permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = 1 AND pr.admin_id = #{adminId}
